clues.text: This lymphatic system organ is on the left side of the abdominal cavity under the diaphragm, & I'll vent mine if you don't know it

Alphabetically, the brain's main lobes are frontal, occipital, parietal & this one responsible for hearing & memory
Pain in your pectineus muscle, which flexes the thigh at the hip, is a sign of this anatomically named sports strain
If you don't win, perhaps you'll at least go out in one of these luminous conclusions

They're the 2 countries that border El Salvador

to its east, Benin;
to its north, Burkina Faso;
to its south, a whole lotta water

James I's lord chancellor from 1618 to 1621
College football's best receiver gets to catch a trophy named for this Oakland Raiders legend, the MVP of Super Bowl 11
This astronaut broadcast, "from the crew of Apollo 8... God bless all of you--all of you on the good Earth"

rounds.comments: (Ken: As my kids often say to me...)

clues.text: On Jan. 4, 1958 this 184-pound man-made object burned up in Earth's atmosphere

An option for those who have not incorporated is filing a DBA, meaning this
Federal tax law is enacted in this, IRC for short
Abbreviated POA, it's a document that allows one person to make legal decisions for another
Abbreviated SJ, it means the judge rules in a case without a full trial

"Wide World of Sports" opened with ski jumper/crasher Vinko Bogataj, symbolizing this phrase

rounds.text: A trio including Andrew Jackson founded this city with a name that evokes a great city of the ancient world
